title: What’s the best rap song? - Quora

response.answer_text: For me, the best rap song is this one  its not the original one made by ice cube, but i think the they did a splendid job at remixing it and its better than the original, in my opinion

If you are asking for suggestions here, then Eminem, logic and if you want to listen rap in a funny way then do listen to Lil dicky's song. Lemme suggest you some of songs:- Eminem-Rap god, beautiful pain, love the way you lie, stan, etc there are so many. And do listen songs of Lil Dicky his way of singing is hilarious listen “Professional Rapper” by Lil Dicky.
